body_html: If the datatype is float32, the summation on the cpu would not give the correct answer (you stop being able to add 1 to a floating point number at 2^24) and the CPU algorithm uses a very small number of accumulators. If the datatype is int32 then it should give the correct result everytime.
body_text: If the datatype is float32, the summation on the cpu would not give the correct answer (you stop being able to add 1 to a floating point number at 2^24) and the CPU algorithm uses a very small number of accumulators.  If the datatype is int32 then it should give the correct result everytime.
body: If the datatype is float32, the summation on the cpu would not give the correct answer (you stop being able to add 1 to a floating point number at 2^24) and the CPU algorithm uses a very small number of accumulators.  If the datatype is int32 then it should give the correct result everytime.
